thread.title: Bruce Hay
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Bruce Hay

author: Bruce Hay
title: Bruce Hay
text: I found the product I was looking for easily on the website. Ordering was straightforward with prompt delivery to my address in France. The packaging was good with the order arriving in perfect condition. Overall, no problems at all.
